summary: Thirteen year-old Marta has recently moved back to southern Italy with her mother and older sister and struggles to find her place, restlessly testing the boundaries of an unfamiliar city and the catechism of the Catholic church.
cast: Yle Vianello|Salvatore Cantalupo|Pasqualina Scuncia|Anita Caprioli|Renato Carpentieri|Maria Trunfio|Paola Lavini|Giovanni Federico|Maria Luisa De Crescenzo|Mario Canino|Monia Alfieri|Licia Amodeo|Carmelo Giordano|Natale Carriago|Federica Colonnetti|Ahlam Harmouch|Silvia Licciardo|Gennaro Mallamaci|Giuliano Marra|Domenico Martorano|Sara Morabito|Marco Tortora|Cinzia Zoccali|Antonino Cuzzola|Giuseppe Pizzimenti|Domenico Scappatura|Marilena Alescio|Giuseppe Crucitti|Demetrio Morabito|Giuseppa D'Amico|Elena De Benedetto|Maria Porcino|Francesca Scuncia|Giuseppa Surace|Francesca Ubaldini|Antonella Cuzzucoli|Chiara Fazzino|Graziana Mallamaci|Annamaria Vazzana|Mara Cuzzucoli|Marcello Fonte|Anna Scaglione|Antonietta Spataro|Pasquale Gatto|Angelo Tronchese
title: Corpo celeste
